abstract: The recent missile test was only the first in a series of nuclear weapon provocations.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: North Korea’s test of a ballistic missile on Sunday was followed by strong, but hollow, condemnations by Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, President Donald Trump and the United Nations Security Council. Richard Haass, the President of the Council on Foreign Relations, had it right when he said the U.N condemnation was the diplomatic equivalent of a “nothing burger.”
snippet: The recent missile test was only the first in a series of nuclear weapon provocations....

headline.main: Trump and North Korea: A Looming Foreign Policy Crisis
